meanings.sent1: Her leadership was marked by its indispensability in guiding the team.
meanings.sent2: The safety equipment is of utmost indispensability in this hazardous environment.
meanings.sent3: His insistence on wearing a superhero cape to work showcased the indispensability of his imagination.
meanings.sent4: The sun's light had an indispensability that brightened even the darkest corners of the room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's patience was an indispensability that helped every student succeed.

meanings.sent1: The indispensability of water for life cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, the indispensability of teamwork becomes evident.
meanings.sent3: The cat's belief in the indispensability of its toy mouse provided endless entertainment.
meanings.sent4: The artist's unique style had an indispensability that set her apart from others.
meanings.sent5: The friendship's strength lay in the indispensability of trust between them.
